data.eml:eml: Revising Australian Pristomerus (Hymenoptera, Ichneumonidae, Cremastinae): species with a tooth on the hind femur

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Klopfstein, Seraina (2016): Revising Australian Pristomerus (Hymenoptera, Ichneumonidae, Cremastinae): species with a tooth on the hind femur. Zootaxa 4168 (2): 201-238, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4168.2.1
